original_text: You people of Judah have as many gods as you have towns! You have built many altars to offer sacrifices to that disgusting god, Baal. You have built as many of those altars as there are streets in Jerusalem!”
korean_text: 유다야 네 신들이 네 성읍의 수와 같도다 너희가 예루살렘 거리의 수대로 그 수치스러운 물건의 제단 곧 바알에게 분향하는 제단을 쌓았도다

sentences.original_text: have as many gods as you have towns!
to offer sacrifices to that disgusting god, Baal.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 혐오스러운 신 바알에게 제물을 바치기 위해

sentences.original_text: You have built as many of those altars
as there are streets in Jerusalem!
